title: Main export partners of Germany 2017
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Share in total exports.
The highest category is found at United_States where Share in total exports is 8.8.
The lowest category is found at Switzerland where Share in total exports is 4.2.
gold: This statistic shows the main export partners of Germany as of 2017 . That year , Germany 's main export partner were the United States with a 8.8 percent share in Germany 's total exports .
